title: Tablecloth, "Last Supper", mid- 19th century
description: White tablecloth with a central design showing the Last Supper repeated in two directions. Border composed of a scrolling vine interrupted by Biblical scenes. Loosely scattered floral forms are in the intervening space.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecloth, "Last Supper", mid- 19th century.
mid- 19th century. Medium: linen
Technique: damask. Gift of Mrs. Alfred Despres. 1943-21-1.
